Translations.Text: Men nulii Nuuhu haa e yimɓe makko ɓen, wonnde : "Jertin yimɓe maa ɓen, ado lette muusuɗe arde e maɓɓe
O maakani [ɓe] : "Ko onon yo yimɓe am, min ko mi jertinoowo on ɓannguɗo
wonnde yo on rewu Allah, hulon Mo, ɗoftoɗon lam
O haforanay on junuubi mon ɗin, O nenna on haa e lajal taƴaangal. [Ko woni tun] lajal Allah ngal si hewtii, ngal nennetaake, si tawii hiɗon anndunoo
O maaki : "Joomi am, min mi noddirii yimɓe am ɓen jemma e ñalorma
kono noddaandu am ndun ɓeydaali ɓe, si wanaa dogugol
Tuma kala kadi nde mi noddi ɓe fii no Hafaranaa ɓe, ɓe waɗay kolli maɓɓe ɗin ka nder noppi maɓɓe, ɓe buumora comci maɓɓe ɗin, ɓe deppitoo, ɓe townitora townitaadee
Refti mi noddirii ɓe e kene
Refti mi feññinani ɓe, mi gunndii ɓe gunndaadee
Mi wi'i [ɓe] : "Insinanee Joomi mon, tawde O siforii wonnde Haforoow
O wurtira toɓo ngon e mo'on rewnindiral
O ɓeydira on jawle e ɓiɗɓe, O waɗana on gese, O waɗana on canɗi
E ko heɓi on, on jortaaki manngural Allah ngal
Hara le O tagir on taaɓe-taaɓe
E on yi'aali no Allah tagiri kammuulli jeeɗiɗi tegondirɗi
O waɗi lewru ndun jalɓundu e majji, O waɗi naange ngen pitilol
Ko Allah fuɗniri on ka leydi fuɗnugol
refti O ruttiray on e mayri, O yaltina on yaltinndee
Allah waɗiranii on leydi ndin weertaandi
fii yo on naatir e mayri laawi yaajuɗi
Nuuhu maaki : "Joomi am, ɓee yeddii lam, ɓe jokkii on mo jawle mun e ɓiɗɓe ɓeydaali ɗum si wanaa hayrugol
Ɓe fewji feere mawnde
ɓe wi'i: "Wata on terto dey reweteeɗi mon ɗin: wata on terto Wudda, e Suwaa'a, e Ya'uuqatha, e Nasr
Ko pellet, ɓe majjinii ko ɗuuɗi. [Joomi] wata A ɓeydir tooñuɓe ɓen, si wanaa majjere
Ko sagu goopi maɓɓe ɗin ɓe yooliranoo, ɓe naadaa Yiite, ɓe heɓanaano ko'e maɓɓe faabotooɗo gaanin Allah
Nuuhu maaki kadi : "Joomi am, wata A accu e leydi ndin, hay keefeero dilloowo
Ko pellet, si A accii ɓe, ɓe majjinay jeyaaɓe Maa ɓen, ɓe jiidoytaako si wanaa bonnooɓe ɗuuɗuɓe geddi
Joomi am, haforanam min e jibimɓe lam ɓen, e ɓen gomɗimɓe naatuɓe ka suudu am, e gomɗimɓe worɓe ɓen e gomɗimɓe rewɓe ɓen; wata A ɓeydir tooñuɓe ɓen, si wanaa halakuyee
